pages.text: Small Ships introduces a fleet of customizable ships that let you explore the seas in style. $(br2)Build your ship, hoist the sails, and embark on a maritime adventure!
Start by crafting a Cog or Brigantine using wood, wool, and iron. $(br2)Customize your ship with different sails, colors, and decorations to make it your own.
Each ship type has unique attributes and storage capacities. $(br2)Sail the open seas, explore distant islands, and transport goods across your world!
